item.title: PS3 Hack Becomes Open Source Tracking Device Project
item.description: PS3 Hack Becomes Open Source Tracking Device Project What started as a tracking device for a PS3 has now become a full-fledged Kickstarter project. This open source tracking device let's you text your tech to get its coordinates. From: mashable Views: 358 19 ratings Time: 01:19 More in News & ...

item.title: Spree Commerce brings flexible e-commerce platform to small businesses
item.description: Spree Commerce brings flexible e-commerce platform to small businesses Are you a small business? Do you want to sell things on your website? Spree Commerce has an easy-to-use platform for doing just that. Here the founder explains it to me or you can learn more at spreecommerce.com From: Scobleizer ...
